website_summaries.verdict: Recommended if the twister pattern appeals to you.
pros: Spinner-created funnel is a fun twist to traditional motion lamps
cons: Can't be set to any one particular color

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lamp!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most recent review says "My 11 year old son loves it". Well...this 48 year old grown man loves it too! :) It took the place in my office of my beloved Lava Lamp which gave up the ghost. Turns out...I like this MORE than I did the Lava Lamp. It makes ZERO noise, and is incredibly soothing to watch. The colors cycle smoothly and its sleek, geometric cylindrical design and a great contrast to the organic, twisting shape of the tornado inside. So happy with this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DanMan

customer_reviews.title: 11-yr-old son absolutely loves this lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he absolutely LOVES it! He turns it on every night since we bought this which has been a while. It still works strong even after being knocked off the stand. We thought for sure it was broken but it still worked. Would make a nice Christmas gift for someone who loves these type of lamps. My son shows no slowing down of liking his.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Thing is awesome. My son loves it and one of the main reasons I purchased this one is because it does not run on batteries. I think it makes a pretty good tornado. Not an EF5 however.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Boyette

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect! We have a cheaper version of a tornado ...
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! We have a cheaper version of a tornado mood lamp and though the tornado might be a little wider, the spinner constantly gets off balanced and messes up. This one was amazing! We have yet had to turn it off and reset the spinner that makes the tornado. It keeps going and going. If you have a tornado/weather lover, this is a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: My 4 yr old grandson loved this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my 4 yr old grandson who is fascinated by tornadoes. He loves watching them spin (but is still too young to understand how scary they really are and the damage they can do). He absolutely LOVED this gift. It also makes a great nightlight but care should be taken as the cylinder is glass and could break if knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamskape

customer_reviews.title: Will not bother to try to replace again
customer_reviews.text: Would not even light up. Second one my son received that was broken. His grandmother had purchased the same one from here that I did. That one lit up but the spinning mechanism was broken off
customer_reviews.author: Rdeal2240

customer_reviews.title: Item came and what a disappointment! The funnel was so small
customer_reviews.text: First unit came and what a disappointment! The funnel was so small, maybe two inches regardless of run time. The unit is quiet however. We reordered another and it seems to be working much better with a full funnel the length of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp, doesn't heat up and is calming to ...
customer_reviews.text: Best lamp, doesn't heat up and is calming to watch much better than the fire hazard lava lamps that take forever to get going. With this guy in a few seconds you can see the tornado in its full glory!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year for Christmas because he loves tornados and weather. He LOVED this gift! I had read reviews saying that it didn't work or that it arrived broken but mine came in perfect! I did order ahead of time and made sure it worked before wrapping it but I was very impressed by the quality! Perfect night light for my tornado loving kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great novelty light, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Very fun lamp, seems to be pretty high quality, especially for the price. -1 star because you can't choose the color, just stobes through the colors. Still super cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was cracked at the top and was very disappointing. It was also packaged horribly and had some tears in the actual box... When I turned it on, the tornado took a minute to work, but it looked cool when it did. Overall, was NOT happy with my experience in ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 11 months.
customer_reviews.text: After only 11 months, this lamp died. It won't spin anymore and just lights up. Very disappointed in it considering we paid a lot for it. Our 5 year old is heart broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The best part were the different lights. Thats about it.
customer_reviews.text: My son had a different kind of tornado lamp years ago and it immediately went into the spiral and stayed that way until you turned it off. We had this one on for an entire day and it would try to spiral but fall apart within minutes and begin again so we returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, good gift,
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use as a nightlight in the kids room, but because u can’t choose the color and it rotates between all colors, it ended up keeping them awake. It’s pretty fun and cool to have, just not as a nightlight
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tornato it's fun changes colors. I'm so happy to add it to my collection of lava lamps n will search Amazon for more fun stuff.love Amazon too
customer_reviews.author: puppas mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a birthday present to 6 year-old nephew that is really interested in tornadoes...he loves it! Uses it as a night light. Great size and glad it is a plugin!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Princess

customer_reviews.title: Well made and cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas gift for grandson who is fascinated with tornadoes. I checked it out before wrapping. Well made, safe and wasaaay cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dave’s not home

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time with all parts!! My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift but didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for son that is fascinated with tornadoes. Tested before gifting and was in working order. After opening, left it on all day with no problems. Turned on as night light and went to turn off after he went to sleep and it was already off. As it turns out, the cord went bad somehow. Called customer service, a replacement was sent and have not had a problem with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as one as a gift for my granddaughter. She loved it!! And so did her brother, and her parents. It was a fun, useful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my kid
customer_reviews.text: 1 star less due to few hiccups. One didn't work. Needed to resend ... Son was desapointed. Plus info about delivery was wrong so he wait 3 days more than the announced date. Appart from that the last one work fine. He love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and it doesn't get hot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She had a lava lamp before that she adored. Sadly the pink glitter in the lamp faded out and the bulb died. Got this as a replacement and she has yet to turn it off. It illuminates her room perfectly. But by far the best part is that it doesn't get overly hot like her old lamp. She can confidently leave it on 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dallenbach

customer_reviews.title: Damaged without prior notice in description.
customer_reviews.text: There was no information in the description to tell me that the top of the tornado lamp was cracked. This was a gift, and the large crack made it embarrassing to me when my grandson opened it. It was well packaged with bubble wrap, and there was no damage to the shipping carton, so I don’t believe the crack happened due to shipping. My grandson kept the lamp and just turned the cracked top toward the wall.
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

customer_reviews.title: ... year old who is obsessed with tornados and his favorite color is red
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 7 year old who is obsessed with tornados and his favorite color is red. Color changes, I don't think there is an option to keep it on one color. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY 11 YEAR OLD SON LOVES THIS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to go along with a orange and gray camo themed room. My son is 11 and he loves it. It displays different colors and he uses it at night. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyParis626

customer_reviews.title: Spinner gets stuck and stops spinning after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: It was great as a night light until about a month when the spinner on the bottom started getting stuck and not spinning anymore. The whole point of this was to have a tornado night light so my son could fall asleep while watching it. This item got tossed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelita

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for Christmas for my 5 year old boy. I’m sure glad I checked to see if it worked first because it doesn’t. The light comes on but it does not spin. The bottom piece is cracked, the top piece is almost cracked all the way in half, and the box appears to be worn and old. I will be contacting the seller ASAP. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent for my 7 year old son. We use this as his night light. It’s really fun to watch. People who come over and see it compliment it :)
customer_reviews.author: Erts

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves weather! So this was perfect for him. Doesn't get hot to the touch which is great
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Better than lava lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Better than a lame lava lamp when you can have a tornado lamp! It’s awesome and the colors are bright!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk art!
customer_reviews.text: Came and worked just as described. I do wish there was an option to pick a color rather than have it automatically change colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cool lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Cool addition to my gameroom. Looks much better than the Lava lamp one it replaced that stopped spinning. The LEDs in it change color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! my almost 5 year old talks and talks about tornados now and watching videos about them 24/7. This is for his birthday and he will absolutely admire it. I opened it to make sure it worked and I was very impressed ! I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fun, a little noisy than I would like though with the plastic piece that spins on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Paco

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: PROBABLY ONE OF THE COOLEST THINGS I HAVE BOUGHT ON AMAZON, LOVE THIS LAMP!!
customer_reviews.author: DIANE R

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: Light works very good very happy with it is just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Fritzie

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. It came in pieces but we figured it out
customer_reviews.author: Diggler

customer_reviews.title: Under Powered
customer_reviews.text: Motor doesn't seem to turn fast enough to keep the tornado effect going. Ive tried various outlets at home and at work with the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Doug3815

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, great price, great fun
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine now for several months. It was a gift to my 5yr old nephew. It still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphfromthesouth

customer_reviews.title: for the price is barely ok
customer_reviews.text: It is ok cuz the light is poor and also the little thing that make thw "bubbles" twist it was loose and didn't make the job well
customer_reviews.author: Harold Callejas

customer_reviews.title: Made a great Secret Santa Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a last minute gift. Runs great, really cool to watch and not as dangerous as a lava lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Hreat Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp as a Christmas gift for my grandson. I think it is one of his favorite gifts this year. The colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie M. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: You can use it for long periods
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Item to my daughter and she love it so much. In my own opinion it's much better than lava lamp. Lava lamp take too long to work, on this lamp it work at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great action piece for any room kids adults etc put another piece on top Tha I had ordered ant it fits on top perfectly as u can c in the photowil probably buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & value
customer_reviews.text: This lamp worked perfectly. Great size and great price! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: It’s quiet! Seems durable thus far (had it for 2 months now).
customer_reviews.author: kaybooboo

customer_reviews.title: Nice...works great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it as a night light, it changes colors...very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cool room decoration
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my cousin's 12th birthday and she loved it. A little pricey, but cheaper ones tend to leak so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A♡

customer_reviews.title: no power cord and cracked on top.
customer_reviews.text: Product had a crack. Dont even know if it works because it doesnt require batteries but they dont send you a plug with it either!! Very disappointed. The description should specify it doesnt include power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Finizio

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tornado light. Well worth the money. I would recommend it to anyone . It’s very relaxing to watch.
customer_reviews.author: David Halkyard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: First impression was very good. Was gift so not sure how it is working now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didnt have a cord inside and the spinner was broken off....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It still works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my step grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pope

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t look like a tornado ! 🙄
customer_reviews.text: The tornado isn’t forming how it’s supposed to. The white bits is the only thing spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Grajeda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't light up
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't light up. It makes the tornado effect but it doesn't show any color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work as as described. The tornado never formed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: ... year old is fascinated by tornadoes so this was perfect for his room
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old is fascinated by tornadoes so this was perfect for his room.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality; definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this! It is good quality; definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Worst tornato lamp ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: But far the worst thing I have bought, this lamp does not function as described at all. The pictures are completely deceiving. The solution inside is just small clumps that just float around, the vortex doesn't function anything like the pictures, it's weak and barley ever looks like a tornado.
customer_reviews.author: Zubin C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sons loved it , 13 and 9 years old
customer_reviews.author: Alev

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of s***. It doesn't work at all. Just throws white particles around and doesn't make a tornado at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboyhatjoe

customer_reviews.title: It's more like swirling chunks rather than a tornado
customer_reviews.text: It works but not very well. It's more like swirling chunks rather than a tornado. My 9 yo was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about a week before the spinner slowed down and eventually stopped. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Franzyshen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about 30 minutes, then stopped spinning. I can't get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stawinsky

customer_reviews.title: Okay, others might be better
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad for the money but the tornado is not quite as strong as in the Pic, you have to give the jar a little wobble when it starts up for it to look like a little stronger tornado. Also the colors change on their own, I was hoping to be able to control what color it was.
customer_reviews.author: AVI

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn't work for more than a few seconds before I have to turn it off and turn it back on to make it work again. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Mots

customer_reviews.title: HELP PLEASE!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I want to return it or replace for a new lamp because my light broke in the first 2 days I never left it on past 5 minutes I left it off most of the time and need a way to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton LoPresto

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No stars. Junk. Item came broken in broken box. In pieces. Cut myself. THINKING OF A LAW SUIT.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fischer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very durable toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this lamp to death! He has knocked it over and even shook it up more than a couple of times. The spinning mechanism does come loose, but it settles to where it needs to be each time it get turned off - which appears to happen magnetically. Then you turn it back on and it works just fine again. He also cannot open it to get the water out. I'm very happy with this novelty lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Woman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product in which I ordered for my mother with dementia. I plugged it in for her and it wouldn’t work. The lights came on but no tornado. No instructions on what to do. I had to take it apart and figure out what was wrong. The springs that were supposed to be installed in the bottom were wedged between the magnetic spinning thing. Luckily I have an extremely long pair of needle nose pliers and after guessing where the springs belong I got it working.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel LaBarge

customer_reviews.title: Indifferent construction quality but looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully, but be cautious when removing it from the box...the construction quality is mediocre; the bottom plastic cap (containing the LED lights and motor) will separate from the glass easily. Carefully remove the top cap to remove the packing plastic and use the included double sided tape to secure the cap.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a birthday present for my 5yo who loves tornadoes and he loves it. We've had it now for almost 2 months. It doesn't get hot or anything, and we often leave it running for hours, no problem. There is a crack in the plastic, and the kid had ripped the box up, so we couldn't return, but it doesn't interfere with anything.
customer_reviews.author: mmwoel

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to tinker with it to get it to work. Once it did, it was awesome and my son LOVES it. If he’s happy, it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMoody1976

customer_reviews.title: I Love Night / LED Lights
customer_reviews.text: Wow, works exactly as displayed on the box. Really cool to watch .. so in those times when my lava lamp is too soothing, this is the perfect anti-dote .. yet, still soothing, but in a different sort of way. It's just really cool watching the tornado as the air bubbles also spin around the tornado itself. AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: BRETT C ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 9yr old son who loves tornadoes. He loves this light! It worked great for six months, then the spinning feature quit working. We bought another one cause he loves it so much, and the price isn’t bad for six months of almost constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Startop

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: This year El developed a fascination with tornados and this ended up being a great gift for him. It came as shown and I tested it before wrapping and delivering. The tornado effect/night light quality should make this a great addition to his room.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great night light!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my son who is obsessed with tornadoes and has to sleep with a night light. He absolutely loves it! Shipping was great, it was packaged nicely and came in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Chow

customer_reviews.title: Made for the little people
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it ! Has gone to sleep just staring at it . It’s great and all but just wished you Would have the choice to keep it on 1 color
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Neat lamp !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat lamp, I like it so much ! I have it with my Lava lamps on a bureau. Looks pretty neat !! I kept it instead of returning it because I liked it so well.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky H.

customer_reviews.title: A HUGE HIT! Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our weather loving 4 year old nephew and it has been a HUGE hit. The colors are bright and the quality is great of this product! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son is obsessed with tornadoes so I figured out that he will like this. I was wrong he LOVES it! It made him more curious on how an actual tornado forms and move.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, still no word from the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Was so disappointed I sent package to grandson and it didnt do what it was supposed to it only changed colors
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Tornado's  are a coming !!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool!! Love the color changes.I would get another one.
customer_reviews.author: jeff cook is cookymonster

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son he loves it. Came before Christmas thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: not full so the styrofoam on the top shows and not at all like i thought. since i wouldn't get the full return price, i put zebra duct tape to cover the low water and kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta H.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The lamp works great. This was a Christmas present for my 11 year old and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MomofBoys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he loves it. Its real good quality and quiet
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves this and it makes a great cat toy as well
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves this and it makes a great cat toy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought one of these tornado lamps for my older son's birthday and we were so impressed with it that we bought a second for his younger brother. These lamps will run 24/7 without any problems if you let them. Yes, the product images make the actual funnel look more dense than they really are but they're still a nice focal point and they also make for a great alternative to the usual night lights. We've had ours for over two months now used daily and no issues so far. I almost want one for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: Deediddly

customer_reviews.title: It's a great lamp, and my 6th graders love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great lamp, and my 6th graders love it, but I was disappointed at the strength of the "tornado" - it's a little weaker - EF1 at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lamp had a piece missing and I am going ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp had a piece missing and I am going to send it back. One of the caps was missing.
customer_reviews.author: sassytidbit

customer_reviews.title: great visual sensory item
customer_reviews.text: I git this for my 8 year old mildly autistic son and he loves it!! Great product and great service!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has aspergers and he is so into weather and space he just loved it
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't produce a decent tornado
customer_reviews.text: Spinner inside of tube does spin however, It doesn't produce a tornado. My husband could get the tornado started by picking the whole lamp up and spinning it. It was short lived though. The lamp was for my nephew. I'm returning it because I don't want him to pick it up himself to spin it and drop it in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ryser

customer_reviews.title: Not as solid as it looks, but like it.
customer_reviews.text: Although the "tornado" isn't as solid as pics & video would imply, we still really like the light. The color changing is great. The tornado itself is made up of little white particles & while spinning there are places where it breaks apart & doesn't make a solid tornado. Overall we like the product though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumps of spinning styrofoam.
customer_reviews.text: This tornado lamp does not work like the picture. The tornado isn't even big. The little pieces just clump up in balls and spin down the middle of the tube. Ugh! Don't bother with this tornado lamp.
customer_reviews.author: EGREVUD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This barely does anything. Didn't look like a tornado at all and made a lot of noise. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Funkhouser

customer_reviews.title: Broke to quick
customer_reviews.text: Broke a couple of months after I got it for my son for Christmas......don't waste your money.....
customer_reviews.author: Carmexkid
